main event: An unidentified object was observed for approximately 10-15 minutes near the Atlantic Ocean shoreline northwest of Wallace, Virginia on 6 October 1958.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about the size of a basketball at arm's length and seemed to be pulsating and swaying from side to side,No sound was heard during the observation,At times, the object emitted a green-colored light,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes,Two civilians were the witnesses who stopped their vehicle to observe the object.
sighted object: unidentified object emitting a green-colored light
